channel.title: Resident Evil Afterlife
channel.description:
I'm sure alot of you have seen this and as with everything else we all have our own opinions..
In mine however, I think this was a pretty epic movie in all... I've now seen all the Resident Evil movies and I think the second and the 4th are by far the best..
[b][u]Spoiler (do not continue if your going to watch)[/u][/b]
All in all I think the fact that the new infection as in resident evil 4 and 5 (the games) was tied into this movie was pretty sweet and the fact that Wesker made his first 'Real Appearance in this movie was pretty epic, But its a real fail that Alice lost her powers from the infection but she's still one bad ass little woman, and you actually get to see what Clair has to offer in a fight.. oh and the first appearance of Chris Redfield was pretty sweet as well

item.title: Resident Evil Afterlife
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Got it on disk just gotta find the stupid DVD remote.

EDIT:
Just finished watching a shit quality version. Damn makers never give you enough information.

item.title: Resident Evil Afterlife
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Moparisthebest:

There seems to be a shitload of movies recently that seem to exist only because they are in 3D and have ‘cool’ special effects. What’s up with that?

Most movies nowadays suck. It seems to be about special effects and a modern version of ‘my dick is bigger then yours’ instead of a good storyline with good actors, supplemented by nice effects.

Read full topic

I’m sure alot of you have seen this and as with everything else we all have our own opinions…

In mine however, I think this was a pretty epic movie in all… I’ve now seen all the Resident Evil movies and I think the second and the 4th are by far the best…

Spoiler (do not continue if your going to watch)

All in all I think the fact that the new infection as in resident evil 4 and 5 (the games) was tied into this movie was pretty sweet and the fact that Wesker made his first 'Real Appearance in this movie was pretty epic, But its a real fail that Alice lost her powers from the infection but she’s still one bad ass little woman, and you actually get to see what Clair has to offer in a fight… oh and the first appearance of Chris Redfield was pretty sweet as well
